div.span: North Union Local School District will remain closed until May 1, 2020.

img.data-caption: North Union FFA Agronomy Team Wins National Career Development Event (CDE) at the National FFA Convention in Indianapolis, IN.
North Union Presents Seussical: The Musical
Construction Continues on the New Athletic Facility
NUHS Robotics Team Qualifies for the 2020 State Championship

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

div.span: This page will be updated throughout the closure.

h3.span: Staff Member of the Year Nominations Sought

span.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12.8000001907349px; background-color: #ffffff;
span.span: It is time to select the North Union Staff Members of the Year!

div.span: Before entering school district buildings, please review the following to determine if any of the criteria apply to you.
North Union Local Schools will now close on Monday, March 16, 2020 through the governor's mandated date of April 3, 2020.
Ohio Governor Mike Dewine announced today that all K-12 schools will close from Tuesday, March 17, 2020 through and including April 3, 2020.
Updates about coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the district's efforts to ensure the health and safety of all students in our buildings
Now's your chance to shape their future. You have the power to shape your future, and the future of all children, by counting everyone in your home in the 2020 Census.
The #NUPride Community and Staff Award will honor one community member or one staff member at each of the North Union Local School District Board of Education Meetings.

h3.span: Courtesy Notice Regarding Ohio Class Action Lawsuit

div.span: The State of Ohio, the Governor, the Ohio Department of Education, and other state-level defendants to a class action lawsuit have reached a proposed settlement and have requested our District's assistance in informing students and parents of the proposed settlement.
